item.title: Jigoku Sensei Nube (2025) Reveals Premiere Date, Trailer, and New Theme Songs
item.description: The ‘Jigoku Sensei Nube’ reboot is set to premiere on July 2, 2025, on TV Asahi with a one-hour special. The latest trailer showcases modern designs, new theme songs, and Ryotaro Okiayu returning as Nube.
